title: The Trojan Horse
overview: After Canada is absorbed into the USA as six new states, former Prime Minister Tom McLaughlin runs for president on a Canadian values platform including gun control and socialized medicine.The Trojan Horse is a Canadian political drama two-part miniseries from 2008, which is a sequel to the 2004 miniseries, H2O. The story revolves around a Canadian national referendum to decide whether or not Canada will join the United States.
